en-US.title: Northern Valley Indian Health
en-US.description: Northern Valley Indian Health is a healthcare center that offers comprehensive medical, dental, behavioral health, and community outreach services. They provide compassionate care for all ages and are committed to non-discrimination, making them a hospitable environment for transgender individuals. The center is dedicated to making all patients feel respected and cared for according to their unique health needs.

address: 845 W East Ave, Chico, CA 95926, USA
